fields.name: Histoire
fields.value: Jeu neuf sous blister pour PC. Descriptions du produit SACRED PLUS contains the award winning SACRED game and the first official 'Plus' pack. With the addition of new regions. quests. weapons and enemies. the kingdom of Ancaria is truly a realm of epic fantasy adventure. Blood-thirsty Orcs and legendary Dragons...Undead Goblins and mystical Ice Elves...Unspeakable horrors in a land besieged by evil. * 6 playable heroes: fearsome Gladiator. ruthless Dark Elf. angelic Seraphim. graceful Wood Elf. powerful Battle Mage and unholy Vampiress * Forge unique weapons. collect rare items. learn Combat Arts. develop new skills. customise combos and perform devastating combo-attacks * Battle with friends and rivals in SACRED's engaging multiplayer modes (Online and LAN) Minimum System Requirements - Windows 98SE/Me/2000XP. Pentium III 800 MHz. 256 MB RAM. 2GB free hard drive space. 4x CD-ROM. 16MB DirectX 8 compatible graphics card. DirectX compatible sound card. DirectX 9.0b or higher (supplied on CD). Multiplayer: Internet Access or network card for multiplayer modes.}
